subject: fix: remove auto-skipWaiting so update banner works
body:
The service worker was auto-activating on install, leaving no
waiting worker for the update mechanism. Now waits for explicit
SKIP_WAITING message from app when user clicks Update.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01ALNf4Yu8id9JqyPF1mQb3m
title: remove auto-skipWaiting so update banner works
